attributes.action: Allow small jewellery and small face piercings in school
attributes.additional_details: Small jewellery is not distracting anyone and being forced to take it off is against our rights
attributes.background: I want our school to be allowed to wear necklaces, bracelets and small facial piercings because it is not distracting anyone and people sometimes have these on for a religion

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about school uniform policies are a matter for individual schools, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Require schools to have gender-neutral uniform policies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597731
